Day 1 Morning (2-3 hours active particip.content_preview:
- Infrastructure setup with DevOps Agent guidance
- Account creation and configuration
- Credentials and secrets management
- Repository and CI/CD pip...

Day 1 Afternoon (On-call availability).content_preview:
- Answer questions as needed
- Approve infrastructure decisions
- Provide additional access as required

Day 2 (1 hour validation).content_preview:
- Test deployment processes
- Verify everything works
- Final approval and sign-off
